The Yak-42 aircraft has a distinctive three-engine configuration, a T-shaped tail, and a short, stubby fuselage with rounded wings.
The Yak-42 has three engines on its tail, a T-shaped tail, and a distinctive nose with a pronounced hump.
The Yak-42 aircraft has three rear engines, which is unique among all types of aircraft.
